objects.name: NCSC
objects.description: The primary organization that authored or published this report.

objects.name: WSqmCons Registry Key
objects.description: Used to store the obfuscated PowerShell script

objects.name: N Registry Key
objects.description: Used to store hardcoded 3DES password for PowerSploit script

objects.name: S Registry Key
objects.description: Used to store hardcoded 3DES salt for PowerSploit script

objects.name: WSqmConBin Registry Key
objects.description: Used to store backup of Microsoft Consolidator executable

objects.name: WSqmConHex Registry Key
objects.description: Used to store backup of Microsoft Consolidator arguments

objects.name: WSqmConBak Registry Key
objects.description: Used to store backup of Microsoft Consolidator scheduled task configuration

objects.name: tmp4071.tmp File
objects.description: Deleted by Infinite Second

objects.name: thumbs.ini File
objects.description: Executed and then deleted by Infinite Second

objects.name: infinite second
objects.description: A PowerShell script that deploys ComRAT malware, using multiple layers of obfuscation and modifying the scheduled task of the Microsoft Consolidator to achieve persistence.

objects.name: comrat
objects.description: A well-documented malware also referred to as Chinch, deployed by the Infinite Second PowerShell script.

objects.name: Infinite Second Installer
objects.description: The entity responsible for deploying Infinite Second to target systems.

objects.name: T1059.001
objects.description: Command and Scripting Interpreter: PowerShell, used by Infinite Second to deploy and set up persistence for ComRAT.

objects.name: T1053.005
objects.description: Scheduled Task/Job: Scheduled Task, used by Infinite Second to create or modify a scheduled task to run as SYSTEM and launch ComRAT.

objects.name: T1112
objects.description: Modify Registry, used by Infinite Second to store cryptographic keys, additional scripts, and obfuscated payloads.

objects.name: T1140
objects.description: Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information, used by Infinite Second to deobfuscate information stored in the registry.

objects.name: T1036.005
objects.description: Masquerading: Match Legitimate Name or Location, used by Infinite Second to masquerade as legitimate software.

objects.name: T1070.004
objects.description: Indicator Removal on Host: File Deletion, used by Infinite Second to delete files.

objects.name: infinitesecond_custom_xor
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule infinitesecond_custom_xor { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "Identifies the XOR implementation" strings: $a = "KGJ5dGVbXSBpbmNvbWVfYnl0ZXMsIGJ5dGVbXSBnYW1tYSl7Ynl0ZVtdIG91dHB1dCA9IG5l dyBieXRlW2luY29tZV9ieXRlcy5MZW5ndGhdO2ZvciAoaW50IGkgPSAwOyBpIDwgaW5jb21lX 2J5dGVzLkxlbmd0aDsgKytpKXtvdXRwdXRbaV0gPSAoYnl0ZSkoaW5jb21lX2J5dGVzW2ldIF 4gZ2FtbWFbaSAlIGdhbW1hLkxlbmd0aF0pO31yZXR1cm4gb3V0cHV0O319", $b = "hieXRlW10gaW5jb21lX2J5dGVzLCBieXRlW10gZ2FtbWEpe2J5dGVbXSBvdXRwdXQgPSBuZXcgYnl0ZVtpbmNvbWVfYnl0ZXMuTGVuZ3RoXTtmb3IgKGludCBpID0gMDsgaSA8IGluY29tZV9ieXRlcy5MZW5ndGg7ICsraSl7b3V0cHV0W2ldID0gKGJ5dGUpKGluY29tZV9ieXRlc1tpXSBeIGdhbW1hW2kgJSBnYW1tYS5MZW5ndGhdKTt9cmV0dXJuIG91dHB1dDt9", $c = "oYnl0ZVtdIGluY29tZV9ieXRlcywgYnl0ZVtdIGdhbW1hKXtieXRlW10gb3V0cHV0ID0gbmV3IGJ5dGVbaW5jb21lX2J5dGVzLkxlbmd0aF07Zm9yIChpbnQgaSA9IDA7IGkgPCBpbmNvbWVfYnl0ZXMuTGVuZ3RoOyArK2kpe291dHB1dFtpXSA9IChieXRlKShpbmNvbWVfYnl0ZXNbaV0gXyBnYW1tYVtpICUgZ2FtbWEuTGVuZ3RoXSk7fXJldHVybiBvdXRwdXQ7fX" condition: any of them }

objects.name: infinitesecond_random_name_function
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule infinitesecond_random_name_function { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "Identifies the random name generator" strings: $ = "function TVM730egf([string[]]$GP50afa) { $UC33gfa = ((1..(Get-Random -Min 2 -Max 4) | % {[Char](Get-Random -Min 0x41 -Max 0x5B)}) -join '');", $ = "$EQ33abh = ((1..(Get-Random -Min 2 -Max 4) | % {[Char](Get-Random -Min 0x30 -Max 0x3A)}) -join '');", $ = "$OFK689fa = ((1..(Get-Random -Min 2 -Max 4) | % {[Char](Get-Random -Min 0x61 -Max 0x6B)}) -join '');" condition: any of them }

objects.name: infinitesecond_hardcoded_strings
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule infinitesecond_hardcoded_strings { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "Identifies hardcoded strings throughout the script" strings: $ = "HKLM:\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\SQMClient\\Windows", $ = "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\WINEVT\\Publishers\\{cabe18a5-69b9-4eec-bed0-fa080ed05a3b}\\ChannelReferences\\0", $ = "C:\\Windows\\Temp\\tmp4071.tmp", $ = "C:\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Customer Experience Improvement Program\\Consolidator", $ = "Microsoft\\Windows\\Customer Experience Improvement Program", $ = "WSqmConHex", $ = "WSqmConBin", $ = "WSqmCons", $ = "WSqmConBak" condition: 4 of them }

objects.name: infinitesecond_3des_file
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule infinitesecond_3des_file { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "3DES Initialisation Vector" strings: $IV = "FVADRCORAOSKBHPX" condition: all of them }

objects.name: infinitesecond_psbreakpoint_luis_armstrong
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule infinitesecond_psbreakpoint_luis_armstrong { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "Identification of unusual PowerShell break point" strings: $ = "Set-PSBreakpoint -Variable luis_armstrong -Mode Write;" condition: all of them }

objects.name: infinitesecond_powershell_reflective_injection
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule infinitesecond_powershell_reflective_injection { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "Identifies a modification made to reflective injection script" strings: $process_number = {7b 54 68 72 6f 77 20 22 43 61 6e 27 74 20 66 69 6e 64 20 70 72 6f 63 65 73 73 20 24 50 72 6f 63 4e 61 6d 65 22 7d 65 6c 73 65 7b 24 50 72 6f 63 49 64 20 3d 20 24 50 72 6f 63 65 73 73 65 73 5b 30 5d 2e 49 44 7d 7d} condition: all of them }

objects.name: Analisi Malware: Infinite Second
objects.description: This report contains technical analysis and indicators associated with malware. infinite second.
